name: Trick-Crow, Handler
effect:
While this card is in a Monster Zone or face-up in the Extra Deck it is treated as an Effect Monster 
(Winged Beast/WIND/Level 4/ATK 1600/ DEF 2200) (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) with the following effect: When this card is summoned from the Spell/Trap Zone, special summon one Trap card from your deck that can be treated as a level 4 or lower WIND monster

When your opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy 1 card in your pendulum zone; end the battle phase, then special summon this card in face-up Defense Position as an Effect Monster
serial: This card cannot be used in a Duel.

pendulum.effect: During your end phase, you can destroy this card, and add one "Trick-Crow" Pendulum card from your deck to your hand
